title: Vettaiyan
short_cast: Rajinikanth, Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil, Rana Daggubati, Manju Warrier, Ritika Singh, Dushara Vijayan, Abirami
cast: Rajinikanth, Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil, Rana Daggubati, Manju Warrier, Ritika Singh, Dushara Vijayan, Abirami
m_reason: violence, sexual content, foul language, alcohol use, substance use, tobacco depictions
desc: A sought-after supercop gets caught in a series of unexpected events when he guns down a criminal in a murder case. Amidst his struggle to justify the act, he must confront his moral compass while fighting corrupt, larger-than-life forces. Vettaiyan explores the underbelly of crime investigations with one man's fight against a world, where justice is a rare commodity.
